values:
Aloha, all my friends out there in livejournal world!

This is my new lj. Why, you may ask, did I make a new lj? Simply for the reason that I wanted a new beginning. Maybe a new lj will give me a new outlook on life, or new courage, or new strength...Okay, I'm not stupid. I know little computer diaries can't do that, but if I believe it can, than I can make it.

And I guess that explains the name foma_guided. Foma is a word from Kurt Vonnegut's Cat's Cradle, which means "harmless untruths." In the front of the book, there's a quote from one of the characters, "Live by the foma that make you brave and kind and healthy and happy." I never finished reading the book, but I think it satirizes religions, how they make people happy by telling them stories that may or may not be true.

I'm not going to kid myself with a foma that this lame entry will get me comments, so since I'm a comment whore, comment to be added.

♥ Kristina
